body_html:
We decided not to support partial hook run since it will complicate the usage.
You may find MonitoredSession.run_step_fn useful. It let's you run with or without hooks since you access the raw session.
body_text:
We decided not to support partial hook run since it will complicate the usage.
You may find MonitoredSession.run_step_fn useful. It let's you run with or without hooks since you access the raw session.
body:
We decided not to support partial hook run since it will complicate the usage. 
You may find `MonitoredSession.run_step_fn` useful. It let's you run with or without hooks since you access the raw session.
